game.name: Smart Moves
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Smart Moves" is a puzzle with a turn-based mechanics. . Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you. Smart moves are the key to survival!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Smart Moves" is a puzzle with a turn-based mechanics. . Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you. Smart moves are the key to survival!
